short_description: ULTIMATE KIDS MAGIC SET - Let your child be the star with 28 magic props allowing your child to perform hundreds of tricks with this ultimate magic set for kids, the largest selection of magic tricks on the market.

STEP BY STEP MAGICAL INSTRUCTIONS - Your children will be able to perform magic in no time and wow you with their magic tricks with step-by-step instructional videos from the Master Magician Leif Davis plus an easy to follow instruction manual included

RISK-FREE - All of our products have our 30-day return policy which means your child can experience their new magic set completely risk-free. Let them show off their new magic skills with one of the most complete magic sets ever made

name: National Geographic Mega Magic Set - More Than 75 Magic Tricks for Kids to Perform with Steps, Video Instructions for Each Trick Provided by a Professional Magician (Amazon Exclusive)
short_description: CLASSIC MAGIC KIT PROPS - Kids will learn the techniques behind many famous magic tricks, including illusions that use cups and balls, a false thumb tip, the ball and vase, an illusion box, a mysterious coin case, and a magic wand.

TWO SPECIALIZED CARD DECKS - Kids will also get to practice and perform with two special magician's card decks. These decks allow kids to perform a wide range of tricks and are great tools for learning sleight of hand.

VIDEO INSTRUCTIONS - This kit contains a link to step-by-step video instructions, with each trick performed by a professional magician! Kids will learn the secrets behind each trick and get performance tips from a seasoned pro.

MULTIPLE TRICK VARIATIONS - Kids will learn the fundamentals as well as more advanced variations of many of the tricks in the kit. They'll be able to put together a whole magic show with all they've learned in no time!

AWARD-WINNING PRODUCTS - Blue Marble, winner of the Toy Association's prestigious Toy of the Year Award, proudly develops products that foster education, imagination, and creativity, with a U.S. support team to ensure a stellar experience!
This product is not produced, endorsed, or in any way affiliated with the Bicycle brand or the United States Playing Card Company.

name: Marvin's Magic - Signature Deluxe Box of Tricks | Executive Set of Magic Tricks | Magic Set for Beginner and Experienced Magicians | Magician Supplies Include Mystical Magic Cards, Dynamic Coins
short_description: AMAZING SELECTION OF MAGIC TRICKS: Packed with professional props, this deluxe magic set includes a magician’s metal wand, metal cups, upgraded crochet balls, casino-quality cards and more. Designed to celebrate the 30th anniversary of Marvin’s Magic.

STUNNING PRESENTATION BOX: All items are displayed in a double-layered black and gold box with a red flock-fleeced interior. A premium collector’s case that protects your props and adds an extra touch of luxury.

LOOK LIKE A PROFESSIONAL MAGICIAN: Featuring Svengali cards, dynamic coins, an authentic himber wallet, magician’s silk and more. Everything you need to perform an impressive magic show for friends and family.
EASY TO LEARN, FUN TO PERFORM: With specially crafted props and a clear guide, you’ll be able to master illusions in minutes. Just add a little practice and performance flair to amaze your audience.

CELEBRATING OVER 35 YEARS OF MAGIC: Join Marvin’s Magic on a journey of wonder with this advanced box of tricks. A fantastic gift for aspiring magicians and a party showpiece for kids and adults alike.
product_description: The brand new Signature Deluxe Box of Tricks from Marvin’s Magic. This hand-picked selection of Marvin’s favourite professional-quality effects. This set features over 100 definitive magic tricks and professional-quality equipment even Marvin would be thrilled to receive! The Signature Deluxe Box of Tricks is a stunning collection of magic, and comes beautifully presented in a unique, double-layered black-and-gold box with red flock-fleeced interior to protect and display each prop. The effects are stunning, the way the props are built and made, they are designed to last and they're designed to be easy to use and still Marvin is delivering that elegance and that quality and the Deluxe Box of Tricks is just perfect in every sense. Box Contains - Dynamic Coins set - Authentic Himber Wallet - Magician’s silk and secret gimmicks - Professional-sized Magician’s Cups - Classic Cups and Balls routine with cotton pom-poms. - Ingenious built-in Chop Cup feature with special crochet balls. - Unique Flying Coins routine - Svengali Cards - Multi-purpose Miracle Cards - Coins and Cards Matrix - Cloth-bound hardback instruction book containing over 100 amazing tricks - Magician’s Wand in classic black and gold - Collector’s Edition embossed Marvin’s Magic silver steel tokens

name: 6Pcs Magic Trick Set for Stage Performances | Easy Magic Kit with Change Bag, Vanishing Silk & More | Great for Beginners
short_description: A Stage Show in One Kit: This kit gives you six fun and colorful props made for stage magic: Magic Change Bag, Pull Flower, Color Changing Silk, Rising Wand, Vanishing Silk, and Magic Ball.
Smooth Routine from the Change Bag: Start strong with the Magic Change Bag and reveal trick after trick in one smooth, connected routine. It keeps the audience guessing and the excitement building.
Beginner-Friendly with Big Visuals: No complex sleight of hand—each trick is simple, quick to learn, and gets big reactions. Great for school performers, family shows, or first-time magicians.
Includes a Full Performance Guide: This isn't just a bag of tricks. You’ll learn how to perform a full show—from introduction to finale—using all six props in one flowing routine.
Ideal for Parties, Events & Gifts: Turn any gathering into a stage. This kit makes an exciting gift and a perfect intro to the world of stage magic.

name: 4Pcs Magic Trick Set for Stage Performances | Easy Magic Kit with Change Bag Routine | Perfect for Beginners
short_description: Pure Stage Magic, No Mix-ups: Most magic sets mix street, close-up, and stage tricks. This one is different—it’s made just for stage shows! Includes 4 easy stage props: Magic Change Bag, Pull Flower, Color Changing Silk, and Rising Wand.

Start the Show with the Change Bag: Everything begins with the classic Magic Change Bag. One by one, amazing tricks come out of it—creating fun surprises and a natural performance flow. It’s not just a prop—it’s the star of your show.
Learn in Minutes, Amaze for Days: Each trick is simple to learn and takes less than 5 minutes to practice. Great for beginners, hobbyists, or anyone who wants to put on a fun and impressive show.

Includes Full Show Routine: More than just trick instructions—you’ll learn a step-by-step performance: opening, middle, and big finish. Follow the routine and turn simple tricks into a mini magic show.
Fun for Any Stage or Party: Whether you're performing at school, family events, or holiday parties, this kit is made for small stages and big smiles. Makes a fun and unique gift, too!
